result.execSummary:
The defendant Luis Alberto Torrecilla Salto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Luis Alberto Torrecilla Salto is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Luis Alberto Torrecilla Salto was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Payment Plan:  $50/month, commencing in May.  (can add to current plan)

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Marquette County DNA Proof of Submission

Defendant Luis Alberto Torrecilla Salto in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Interpreter Enrique Soria appears in court; previously sworn by the clerk.
Atty Hendee states that an offer was made to the defendant.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant would like to accept the offer.    Atty Hendee states plea agreement to Ct. 2.  Ct. 1 to be dismissed.  Defendant agrees.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney and would like to proceed.  
Defendant enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty.

Defendant makes a statement to the court.

BY THE COURT:  Ct. 2:  Court Costs = $243.00
  DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge
  Defendant agrees to the $15.00 payment plan fee.
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in May

Ct. 1 to be dismissed.

Pre-trial conference at 03-17-2016 01:30 pm.
Return date at 04-07-2016 01:45 pm.

Defendant Luis Alberto Torrecilla Salto in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Interpreter Enrique Soria sworn by the clerk.
  Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set along with booking.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.    Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.

  BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking today

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.  Court accepts defendant's waiver.
BY THE COURT:  Set Return and Pre-Trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Return date scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:45 pm.
